dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Miscellaneous Details
dataObjects.description: "Taxonomic Notes: Botia striata was described by Rao (1920) from Tunga river at Shimoga, Karnataka, India."

dataObjects.description: Asia:  Western Ghats and Maharashtra in India.
